tool_description: Turn product photos into eye-catching images
name: PRODUCT TEMPLATE
title: PRODUCT TEMPLATE

api_list.name: Template to Image
api_list.description: Makes a new image from the indicated template, photographs and texts
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://product-template.p.rapidapi.com/template_to_image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "product-template.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://product-template.p.rapidapi.com/template_to_image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "product-template.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
